block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This plane, the Imaginary Voyage designed by Didier Boursin, is the 39th member of our 100 exotic paper airplane challenge. This little origami paper airplane is relatively easy to fold and is a must try for anybody interested in paper airplanes. It is folded from a single square sheet. I hope you enjoy it! If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 038 : Manta Jet by Michael G. LaFosse", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/ttKz87mVrz4 Imaginary Voyage by Didier Boursin Tutorial Timeline: 0:00 Demonstration 0:06 Flight Test 0:27 Start Folding 1:25 Folding the Wing Body of The Paper Airplane 2:20 Folding the Nose of the Paper Airplane 2:50 Folding the Wing of the Paper Airplane 3:20 Folding the Vertical Fins of the Paper Airplane 3:45 Opening up the Paper Airplane 4:10 How to Throw Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
